questionTitle: A bear market is a prolonged period ___ falling prices.
Visitors can only watch the workings of the stock exchange from the third-floor ___.
A bull market is characterized by ___ prices.
A gong ___ at 9:15 am to signal the beginning of a new work day at the New York Stock Market.
A gong is heard at 4:15 pm to mark ___ trading.
Only the initials of the companies and the price of their shares ___ on the billboard.
The Dow Jones is an index ___ the economists Edward Jones and Charles Henry Dow.
Two occasions of ___ declining activity were registered in the years of 1929 and 1987.
Investors ___ at the electronic billboard where bright green letters and numbers flow by on a black background.
The New York Stock Exchange edifice dates ___ 1903.
